H0.text: Organ is a structure composed of one or more types of tissues.

H1.text: A system is a structure composed of one or more types of tissues.

H2.text: Muscle is a structure composed of one or more types of tissues.

H3.text: Node is a structure that is composed of one or more types of tissues.

A4.text: In a multicellular organism, an organ is a collection of tissues joined in a structural unit to serve a common function.

A5.text: When three or more organs are present, it is called an organ system.
